name: Pumpkin Smashing [Early Demo]
description:
Pumpkin Smashing is a game I've been working on I made an early demo of it so people can try it out. The full version of the game is going to have a lot more content than this early demo, some ideas are more upgrades and possibly a leveling system. If you are interested in the game you can donate to help support me and any future games I may work on in the future.

Tutorial and Controls:

Click the Pumpkin to get Points depending on the difficulty you set it to, Easy - 25 points gives you 5$, Normal - 50 points gives you 5$. To open the shop menu press the Up Arrow Key, to close the shop menu press the Down Arrow Key. Press the Space Bar on an item in the shop to know what it does and to know what the price of the item is.

Early Demo:

Not much is in the game yet I have gotten it to a playable version that both works and is fun to play, more will be added to the demo soon since the game is still in early development.

Early Demo v.1.0.0:

Early Demo is released.

Early Demo v.1.1.0:

Added, "Phone Mode" button which makes the game able to be played on mobile phones, "Phone Mode" added a "?" button that allows people to check the price of an item and what it does.

Early Demo v.1.1.1:

Fixed a small bug where white pumpkins and green pumpkins would run out of time to smash after the pumpkin is already smashed.
